trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around September 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 11:00 pm eastern standard time, I was out side looking at the clear sky . In the northeast at about 35 degrees above the horizon I saw a circle of lights that were red green and sometimes white blinking in what seemed to be a random pattern. They stayed in a tight globe , for a while but at some point changed to an oval and cigar. I watched it for at least 40,minutes. In that time it did not move at all.I looked at it with binoculars in focus. I left that setting and the next morning looked into the sky to see what object would be in focus. The were some light cirus clouds at about the same inclination. Thats where the focus was the most clear. So how far away it was I don't know. 10, 20 miles? All the time it did not move. When I went to bed it was still there.
